item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Last Modified: August 01 2024 Quick Start It’s remarkably easy to start using Hugo. So much so it makes me want to start working on my portfolio immediately. To start, we need to use PowerShell instead of Windows PowerShell. Apparently, they are different. You also need to have Git installed. Once both are done, you can run the following commands: hugo new site quicksite This creates a new directory that will become our new website.
